item.title: From Law to Computer Science
item.description: As someone who has studied both law and computer science, I have come to realize that my true passion lies in the latter field. While a law degree can certainly be valuable in terms of developing people skills and the ability to interpret and apply rules and concepts, I have found that my interests lie more in exploring the universe through the lens of computer science and programming. Teach You how to Think vs the Dullness of Law Link to heading One of the most powerful conceptual frameworks in computer science is the use of graphs, which can model everything from protein structures to social networks and even the human body.
